channel.title: Making laws
channel.description:
i've mined about 25k rune ess and my rune crafting is high enough to make laws. im thinking of becoming a member just to runecraft laws.
where is the alter for crafting laws, and whats around it. i want to know if it would be difficult to get there
and is there any other requirements other than the runecrafting level and talisman to craft laws?

item.title: Making laws
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

RiP CiTy:

Near to altar are many pkers and lurers. Be careful!

only if you are using the abyssal method of crafting.

Read full topic

item.title: Making laws
item.dc:creator: @RiP_CiTy RiP CiTy
item.description:
@RiP_CiTy wrote:

Near to altar are many pkers and lurers. Be careful!

item.title: Making laws
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“sidishere, post:7, topic:95765”]dang the one where you need pure ess hurts = [
so you need pure ess for all members rune to craft?[/quote]
correct, pure essence can make ANY essence, wherase regular essence only make non-members stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Making laws
item.dc:creator: @PPzW_T-T PPzW_T-T
item.description:
@PPzW_T-T wrote:

lol, also its pretty hard to make laws by yourself :eek: get enough money and get a few runners with yeh, so they can carry a load of essence as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Making laws
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

Just to let u know you need to beat a quest to get the law tally…Im pretty sure the quest is pretty hard like you need 30 something herblore and that might take a while… I just cant remember which quest it is…

Read full topic

item.title: Making laws
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

aww mort you burst his bubble, lol.
offtopic - sid i will definatly pay 35 ea for the rune essence you mined… if you wanna sell pm me please.

Read full topic

item.title: Making laws
item.dc:creator: @M0rtion M0rtion
item.description:
@M0rtion wrote:

Beside the point, if your ‘thinking’ on getting memebers, and clearly you’v never been one, the 25k rune ess you just minned is pointless, you need pure essance which is only avalible minning on a members server, so ya kinda screwed up there Not to worry, just sale the ess and buy pure ess, like double the price, but you know.

~Mort

Read full topic

item.title: Making laws
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

its on entrana island at the north east corner, its pretty easy to walk from draynor and then go to the alter then use a glory to tele back to draynor…
abyss may be easier for making laws though.
im 52 rcing btw…

Read full topic
